mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member_sskcook WHERE #{memberId} = member_id AND #{sskcookId} = sskcook_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_sskcook(member_sskcook_id, member_id, sskcook_id, regdate) VALUES (member_sskcook_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{sskcookId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT c.sskcook_url AS sskcookUrl, c.sskcook_id AS sskcookId, c.title, b.nickname, TO_CHAR(b.profile_img) as profileImage, NVL(a.countLikes, 0) AS countLikes FROM (SELECT sskcook_id, sskcook_url, title, regdate, member_id, status FROM sskcook WHERE sskcook_id IN (SELECT sskcook_id FROM member_sskcook WHERE member_id = (SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE username = #{username} AND status = 'ACTIVE')) AND status = 'ACTIVE') c LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(sskcook_id) AS countLikes, sskcook_id FROM likes GROUP BY sskcook_id) a ON a.sskcook_id = c.sskcook_id INNER JOIN member b ON b.member_id = c.member_id ORDER BY countLikes DESC, c.regdate DESC OFFSET (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.pageSize} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.pageSize} ROWS ONLY
